SurfaceType.description: The type of a surface material.

LayersOfLayerCombination.description: List of Layers included in the Layer Combination.

attributeId.description: The identifier of the Layer attribute.

isHidden.description: Visibility of the Layer in the Layer Combination.

isLocked.description: Lock state of the Layer in the Layer Combination.

isWireframe.description: Is wireframe mode forced for the Layer in the Layer Combination.

intersectionGroupNr.description: Intersection group of the Layer in the Layer Combination. Elements on layers having the same group will be intersected.

LayerCombinationAttributeDetails.description: The details of the layer combination attribute.

attributeId.description: The identifier of the layer combination attribute.

attributeIndex.description: The index identifier of the layer combination attribute.

name.description: The name of the layer combination.

LayerCombinationAttributeOrError.description: A layer combination attribute or an error.

Guid.description: A Globally Unique Identifier (or Universally Unique Identifier) in its string representation as defined in RFC 4122.

Hotlink.description: The details of a hotlink node.

location.description: The path of the hotlink file.

children.description: The children of the hotlink node if it has any.

PossibleStringValues.description: The possible string values of a GDL parameter.

PossibleNumericValues.description: The possible numeric values of a GDL parameter.

displayName.description: The display name of the parameter.

dimension1.description: The 1st dimension of array (in case of array value).

dimension2.description: The 2nd dimension of array (in case of array value).

valueDescription.description: The value description for numeric parameter.

isLocked.description: The parameter is locked; i.e. the user cannot modify it

canHaveCustomValue.description: The parameter can have a custom value.

PolyArc.description: Representation of an arc segment of a two dimensional polygon/polyline.

begIndex.description: Node index of one end point of the arc.

endIndex.description: Node index of the other end point of the arc.

arcAngle.description: Angle of the arc; it is positive, if the arc is on the right-hand side of the straight segment.

name.description: The filename of the texture in the library (without extension).

xSize.description: X size of the picture in model space, by default 1.

ySize.description: Y size of the picture in model space, by default 1.

FillRectangle.description: True, if fit the rectangle with the picture in a central position, using the natural aspect ratio of the picture.

FitPicture.description: True, if fit the picture in the middle of the rectangle, using the natural aspect ratio of the picture.

mirrorX.description: True, if the texture is mirrored in X direction.

mirrorY.description: True, if the texture is mirrored in Y direction.

useAlphaChannel.description: True, if the alpha channel of the texture is used.

alphaChannelChangesTransparency.description: True, if the alpha channel of the texture changes the transparency.

alphaChannelChangesSurfaceColor.description: True, if the alpha channel of the texture changes the surface color.

alphaChannelChangesAmbientColor.description: True, if the alpha channel of the texture changes the ambient color.

alphaChannelChangesSpecularColor.description: True, if the alpha channel of the texture changes the specular color.

alphaChannelChangesDiffuseColor.description: True, if the alpha channel of the texture changes the diffuse color.

SuccessfulExecutionResult.description: The result of a successful execution.

FailedExecutionResult.description: The result of a failed execution.

error.description: The details of an execution failure.

ElementFilter.description: A filter type for an element.

IssueElementType.description: The attachment type of an element component of an issue.

IssueCommentStatus.description: The status of an issue comment.

PropertyGroupId.description: The identifier of a property group.

PropertyGroupIdArrayItem.description: A wrapper containing the property group identifier.

PropertyIdArrayItem.description: A wrapper containing the property identifier.

PropertyValue.description: The display string value of a property.

PropertyValueArrayItem.description: A wrapper containing the property value.

PropertyValueOrErrorItem.description: A property value or an error

PropertyValuesArrayItem.description: A wrapper containing the property values.

PropertyValuesOrError.description: A list of property values or an error.

PropertyValuesOrErrorArray.description: A list of property value lists.

ElementPropertyValue.description: A property value with the identifiers of the property and its owner element.

ElementPropertyValues.description: A list of element property values.

AttributePropertyValue.description: A property value with the identifiers of the property and its owner attribute.

AttributePropertyValues.description: A list of attribute property values.

DisplayValueEnumId.description: An enumeration value identifier using the displayed value.

NonLocalizedValueEnumId.description: An enumeration value identifier using the nonlocalized value.

EnumValueId.description: The identifier of a property enumeration value.

EnumValueIdArrayItem.description: A wrapper containing the identifier of a property enumeration value.

NormalOrUserUndefinedPropertyValue.description: A normal or a userUndefined property value.

PropertyValueDetails.description: A normal, userUndefined, notAvailable or notEvaluated property value.

UserUndefinedPropertyValue.description: A userUndefined value means that there is no actual number/string/etc. value, but the user deliberately set an Undefined value: this is a valid value, too.

NotAvailablePropertyValue.description: A notAvailable value means that the property is not available for the property owner (and therefore it has no property value for it).

NormalNumberPropertyValue.description: A number property value containing a valid numeric value.

NormalIntegerPropertyValue.description: An integer property value containing a valid integer number.

NormalStringPropertyValue.description: A string property value containing a valid string.

NormalBooleanPropertyValue.description: A boolean property value containing a valid boolean value.

NormalLengthPropertyValue.description: A length property value containing a real length value. The value is measured in SI (meters).

NormalAreaPropertyValue.description: An area property value containing a real area. The value is measured in SI (square meters).

NormalVolumePropertyValue.description: A volume property value containing a real volume. The value is measured in SI (cubic meters).

NormalAnglePropertyValue.description: An angle property value containing a real angle. The value is measured in SI (radians).

NormalNumberListPropertyValue.description: A number list property value containing numbers in an array.

NormalIntegerListPropertyValue.description: An integer list property value containing integers in an array.

NormalStringListPropertyValue.description: A string list property value containing strings in an array.

NormalBooleanListPropertyValue.description: A boolean list property value containing boolean values in an array.

NormalLengthListPropertyValue.description: A length list property value containing length values in an array. The values are measured in SI (meters).

NormalAreaListPropertyValue.description: An area list property value containing areas in an array. The values are measured in SI (square meters).

NormalVolumeListPropertyValue.description: A volume list property value containing volumes in an array. The values are measured in SI (cubic meters).

NormalAngleListPropertyValue.description: An angle list property value containing angles in an array. The values are measured in SI (radians).

NormalSingleEnumPropertyValue.description: A single enumeration property value containing the ID of the selected enum value.

NormalMultiEnumPropertyValue.description: A multiple choice enumeration property value containing the IDs of the selected enum values in an array.

BasicDefaultValue.description: Default value of the property in case of a basic property value (ie. not an expression).

ExpressionDefaultValue.description: Default value of the property in case of an expression based property value.

ClassificationSystemId.description: The identifier of a classification system.

ClassificationSystemIds.description: A list of classification system identifiers.

ClassificationItemId.description: The identifier of a classification item.

classificationItemId.description: The element's classification in the given system. If no value is specified here, the element is Unclassified in this system.

ClassificationIdArrayItem.description: A wrapper containing the classification identifier.

ClassificationIdOrError.description: A classification identifier or an error.

ClassificationIdsOrErrors.description: A list of element classification identifiers or errors.

ElementClassificationItemArray.description: A wrapper containing a list of element classification identifiers or errors.

ElementClassificationsOrErrors.description: A list of element classification identifiers or errors.

ElementClassifications.description: A list of element classification identifiers.

BoundingBox3D.description: A 3D bounding box of an element.

xMin.description: The minimum X value of the bounding box.

yMin.description: The minimum Y value of the bounding box.

zMin.description: The minimum Z value of the bounding box.

xMax.description: The maximum X value of the bounding box.

yMax.description: The maximum Y value of the bounding box.

zMax.description: The maximum Z value of the bounding box.

BoundingBox3DArrayItem.description: A wrapper containing a 3D bounding box.

BoundingBox3DOrError.description: A 3D bounding box or an error.

NavigatorItemIds.description: A list of navigator item identifiers.

NavigatorItemId.description: The identifier of a navigator item.

ViewSettings.description: The settings of a navigator view

modelViewOptions.description: The name of the model view options. If empty, the view has custom model view options.

layerCombination.description: The name of the layer combination. If empty, the view has custom layer combination.

dimensionStyle.description: The name of the dimension style. If empty, the view has custom dimension style.

penSetName.description: The name of the pen set. If empty, the view has custom pen set.

graphicOverrideCombination.description: The name of the graphic override combination. If empty, the view has custom graphic override combination.

zoom.description: The actual zoom parameters, rectangular region of the model.

xMin.description: The minimum X value of the zoom box.

yMin.description: The minimum Y value of the zoom box.

xMax.description: The maximum X value of the zoom box.

yMax.description: The maximum Y value of the zoom box.

Hole2D.description: A 2D hole in an element defined by closed polylines

polygonOutline.description: The 2D coordinates of the edge of the hole.

polygonArcs.description: Polygon outline arcs of the hole.

Holes2D.description: A list of 2D holes in an element defined by closed polylines

Hole3D.description: A 3D hole in an element defined by closed polylines

polygonCoordinates.description: The 3D coordinates of the polygon of the hole.

polygonArcs.description: Polygon outline arcs of the hole.

Holes3D.description: A list of 3D holes in an element defined by closed polylines

bottomOffset.description: base level of the wall relative to the floor level

offset.description: wall's base line's offset from ref. line

arcAngle.description: The arc angle of the curved wall in radians.

begThickness.description: Thickness at the beginning in case of trapezoid wall

endThickness.description: Thickness at the end in case of trapezoid wall

polygonOutline.description: Polygon outline in case of polygonal wall

polygonArcs.description: Polygon arcs in case of polygonal wall

level.description: base height of the beam relative to the floor level

offset.description: beam ref.line offset from the center

slantAngle.description: The slant angle of the beam in radians.

arcAngle.description: The arc angle of the (horizontally) curved beam in radians.

verticalCurveHeight.description: The height of the vertical curve of the beam.

level.description: Distance of the reference level of the slab from the floor level.

offsetFromTop.description: Vertical distance between the reference level and the top of the slab.

polygonArcs.description: Polygon outline arcs of the slab.

bottomOffset.description: base level of the column relative to the floor level

angle.description: The rotation angle (radian) of the marker symbol

clipPolygon.description: The clip polygon of the detail/worksheet

referredView.description: Guid of the referred view. Only if the marker refers to a view.

referredDrawing.description: Guid of the referred drawing. Only if the marker refers to a drawing.

referredPMViewPoint.description: Guid of the referred view point. Only if the marker refers to a view point.

categoryAttributeId.description: The identifier of the zone category attribute.

stampPosition.description: Position of the origin of the zone stamp.

isManual.description: Is the coordinates of the zone manually placed?

polygonCoordinates.description: The 2D coordinates of the edge of the zone.

polygonArcs.description: Polygon outline arcs of the zone.

angle.description: The rotation angle of the curtain wall in radians.

gridAngle.description: The angle of the grid in radians.

isNegativeArc.description: Indicates if the arc is negative.

polygonCoordinates.description: The 3D coordinates of the panel polygon.

isHidden.description: Indicates if the panel is hidden (deleted panels remain in the database).

segmentIndex.description: The index of the curtain wall segment to which this panel belongs.

CurtainWallFrameType.description: Enumeration of available curtain wall frame types.

panelConnectionHole.description: The parameters of the panel connection hole.

d.description: Depth of the panel connection hole.

w.description: Width of the panel connection hole.

frameContour.description: The parameters of the frame contour.

segmentIndex.description: The index of the curtain wall segment to which this frame belongs.

MeshSkirtType.description: The type of the skirt structure.

level.description: The Z reference level of coordinates.

polygonCoordinates.description: The 3D coordinates of the outline polygon of the mesh.

polygonArcs.description: Polygon outline arcs of the mesh.

sublines.description: The leveling sublines inside the polygon of the mesh.

coordinates.description: The 3D coordinates of the leveling subline of the mesh.

TypeSpecificDetails.description: Represents the complete type-specific details of an element. Used as output from GET requests

RevisionIssueId.description: The identifier of a revision issue.

DocumentRevisionId.description: The identifier of a document revision.

DocumentRevisionReference.description: A reference to a document revision belonging to the current issue

DocumentRevisionReferences.description: All document revisions belong to the current issue.

firstRevisionIssueId.description: The identifier of the first issue in which the given change is issued.

changes.description: All changes belonging to the given document revision.

RevisionChangesArrayItem.description: A wrapper containing an array of revision changes

StoryParameters.description: Represents all parameters of a single project story, including its unique identifiers. Used in API responses.

dispOnSections.description: Story level lines should appear on sections and elevations.

StoriesParameters.description: A list of project stories, each with their complete parameters.

StorySettings.description: Contains the configurable settings for creating or modifying a story. Used as input in API requests.

dispOnSections.description: Story level lines should appear on sections and elevations.

StoriesSettings.description: A list of story settings, used as input for creating or modifying multiple stories.

referencePosition.description: Reference point to automatically find zone.

polygonCoordinates.description: The 2D coordinates of the edge of the zone.

polygonArcs.description: Polygon outline arcs of the zone.

ZoneCreationGeometry.description: Defines the geometry of a zone. Used as input for creating zones.

bottomOffset.description: base level of the wall relative to the floor level

offset.description: wall's base line's offset from ref. line

begThickness.description: Thickness at the beginning in case of trapezoid wall

endThickness.description: Thickness at the end in case of trapezoid wall

TypeSpecificSettings.description: Defines the modifiable type-specific settings for an element. Used as input for SET requests.

PropertyGroupArrayItem.description: A wrapper containing a property group

possibleEnumValues.description: The possible enum values of the property when the property type is enumeration.

enumValue.description: The description of an enumeration value.

nonLocalizedValue.description: Nonlocalized value of the enumeration if there is one.

availability.description: The identifiers of classification items the new property is available for.

group.description: The property group defined by name or id. If both fields exists the id will be used.

PropertyDefinitionArrayItem.description: A wrapper containing a property definition

connectedElementId.description: The unique identifier of the connected element.

isExternal.description: True if the boundary is an external one.

neighbouringZoneElementId.description: Returns the unique identifier of the other Zone the element connects to if the boundary is internal. Please note that this boundary does not represent the boundary of the element with the other Zone.

area.description: The area of the polygon of the boundary.

polygonOutline.description: The outline polygon of the boundary.

ZoneBoundariesResponseOrError.description: The response of the zone boundaries command or an error.

BuildingMaterialPhysicalPropertiesList.description: A list of building material physical properties

BuildingMaterialPhysicalProperties.description: The physical properties of a single building material.

ProjectInfoFields.description: A list of project info fields.

projectInfoId.description: The id of the project info field.

projectInfoName.description: The name of the project info field visible on UI.

projectInfoValue.description: The value of the project info field.

LibraryFileAdditions.description: A list of library file additions to the embedded library

inputPath.description: The path to the input file.

outputPath.description: The relative path to the new file inside embedded library.

type.description: The type of the library part. By default 'Pict'.

LibraryPartType.description: Enumeration of available library part types.
